description: Source code for API endpoints managing TR-181 parameter catalog, including import, search, tree building, retrieval by ID, and validation.

methods.name: import_tr181_seed( body: TR181ImportRequest, request: Request, )
methods.description: API endpoint to import TR-181 seed data into the database.

methods.name: search_tr181_parameters( request: Request, path_prefix: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by path prefix (e.g., 'Device.WiFi')"), param_type: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by type (string, boolean, int, etc.)"), access: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by access level (readOnly, readWrite)"), search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in path or description"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Items per page"), )
methods.description: API endpoint to search TR-181 parameters with various filters.

methods.name: get_tr181_tree( request: Request, root_path: str = Query("Device", description="Root path to build tree from"), )
methods.description: Builds a hierarchical tree of TR-181 parameters based on path segments.

methods.name: get_tr181_parameter( param_id: str, request: Request, )
methods.description: Retrieve details of a specific TR-181 parameter by its ID.

methods.name: validate_tr181_parameters( body: TR181ValidationRequest, request: Request, )
methods.description: Validate a set of TR-181 parameters and their values before applying.

ctags.name: get_tr181_tree
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, root_path: str = Query("Device", description="Root path to build tree from"), )

ctags.name: search_tr181_parameters
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, path_prefix: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by path prefix (e.g., 'Device.WiFi')"), param_type: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by type (string, boolean, int, etc.)"), access: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by access level (readOnly, readWrite)"), search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in path or description"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Items per page"), )
